channel.title: TopTechWizard Blog
channel.description: This is my blog where I post about (tech) stuff and things.

item.title: Super FoodTown: The game
item.description:
Okay so I did a do and made a game called “Super FoodTown”

TBH I didn’t know what I was doing, it was my first truly completed game made in love2d and also my first game made in moonscript

The Windows binaries can be found here, but for everybody else just grab a copy of Love over here and zip up the “comp” folder in the repository and just rename it from a .zip to a .love file.

I don’t even know why I made it actually. It’s really weird.

item.title: Introduction to coding!
item.description: Hello! Today, I’ve made a flow chart that should hopefully make coding less intimidating and help you make your first computer program!

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World! :D

This is my blog, where I’ll be posting tech stuff probably. And things like that.
